question.questionText: Paula wants to test a food to see if it contains acid and/or sugar. When Paula added water and yeast to a sample of the food and put the mixture in a warm water bath, the mixture began to fizz and bubble. What does this chemical reaction indicate?

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Carbon Dioxide carbon dioxide.
There is sugar in the mixture.
The chemical reaction indicates that it has a lot of sugar in it.
